attributes.action: Design and provide a comfortable, practical and quality police uniform for UK officers
attributes.additional_details:
Design and issue a comfortable, practical and quality police uniform -- gender specific, covert light weight stab proof vest, quality materials, summer and winter uniform, reduce layers, reduce injury, reduce absence, footwear that meets health and safety legislation.

Uniform survey carried out by the University of Dundee in conjunction with legacy Tayside Police in March 2013 produces factual evidence.
